define: Use this api to generate first mile tracking number for courier delivery method.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The shipment method for generate and bind orders. Available value: courier_delivery.

","name":"shipment_method","sample":"courier_delivery","type":"string","required":"True","key":"SsEYrJs"},{"description":"

Use this field to specify the region you want to ship parcel. Available value: CN.

","name":"region","sample":"CN","type":"string","required":"False","key":"BfaJBYm"},{"description":"

The list of order_sn. You can specify up to 50 order_sns in this call. One fm_tn maximum number of total bind orders is 10000.

","name":"order_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"jQJrfMW","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"2410106R7TSAJR","type":"string","required":"True","key":"FdxPTHS"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

","name":"package_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"nWhbtCc"}]},{"description":"

The set of information you need to generate FM tracking number and bind orders.

","name":"courier_delivery_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"True","key":"rbxQdpb","children":[{"description":"

The identity of address. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_address_list, address_type need to be FIRST_MILE_PICKUP_ADDRESS.

","name":"address_id","sample":"11222","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"zGsZsCP"},{"description":"

The identity of transit warehouse address. Retrieved from v2.first_mile.get_transit_warehouse_list.

","name":"warehouse_id","sample":"ECP04","type":"string","required":"True","key":"WrKNJkd"},{"description":"

The definition of logistics product ID: 

1010003 (kuaidi100 to C) - seller book courier pickup and pay offline

1010004 (kuaidi100 prepaid(MP)) - seller can use prepaid account to place courier order, so prepaid_account_id is required

","name":"logistics_product_id","sample":"1010004","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"EktXnQE"},{"description":"

ID of prepaid account. Retrieved from v2.merchant.get_merchant_prepaid_account_list.

","name":"prepaid_account_id","sample":"21","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"yHtZiPZ"},{"description":"

The identity of courier service. Retrieved from v2.first_mile.get_courier_delivery_channel_list.

","name":"courier_service_id","sample":"LCN70002","type":"string","required":"True","key":"kiPTwmX"}]}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YDyTDab"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mCnjbpR"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"krizQib"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"fPTweNe","children":[{"description":"

","name":"binding_id","sample":"DCN249601021852HU","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EEtJnFJ"},{"description":"","name":"success_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"PNfkmPi","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"2410106R7TSAJR","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WfEFDja"},{"description":"

","name":"package_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GpxZjwf"}]},{"description":"","name":"fail_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"pQMBTaX","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"2004239MRBBFPJ","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HRGNFYf"},{"description":"
